metadata.name: Pico Button + LED (GPIO16 input, GPIO17 output)
metadata.description: Pushbutton with 10k立 pulldown on GP16 and LED on GP17 with 220立 current limiting. Uses no rails.

wires.description: Provides HIGH to one side of the button (4D shares bus with 4E).
Reads button state on the 5-column bus (shared with 5E and 5D).
Grounds the far end of the 10k立 pulldown (10C shares bus with 10D).
Drives LED through 220立 series resistor (15C shares bus with 15D).
Ground return for LED cathode (20C shares bus with 20E).
